name: overlay aerial
desc: The overlay_aerial module will take as input a field and then map an image onto the horizontal areas of the grid.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Max Edge Angle
properties.desc: The Max Edge Angle angle is defined as the angle between two faces or cells in the model.

properties.name: Image Quality
properties.desc: The Image Quality allows the user to select the maximum resolution to read the input image in at.  This allows the user to create a coarse image for faster testing and a high resolution image for the final output.

properties.name: Georeferencing Method
properties.desc: The Georeferencing Method controls how an image will be distorted to fit the input surface. The Method is selected by the user but is also controlled by the type of georeferencing file found to be associated with the image file. Please read the help for more detials.

properties.name: Min Extents
properties.desc: The Min Extents allow the user to set the position of the lower left corner of the image, when the Map to Min / Max Georeferencing method is chosen.

properties.name: Max Extents
properties.desc: The Max Extents allow the user to set the position of the upper right corner of the image, when the Map to Min / Max Georeferencing method is chosen.

properties.name: Texture Bottom Surfaces
properties.desc: The Texture Bottom Surfaces toggle will tell the module to texture all surfaces whose normals are point downward.

properties.name: Map Data
properties.desc: The Map Data toggle will cause the module to pass the first nodal data component through to the renderable object.  NOTE: This will cause there to be a blending between the the nodal data color value and the image color.

properties.name: Wall Visibility
properties.desc: The Wall Visibility toggle when turned on will display the vertical surfaces or 'Walls'.

properties.name: Border And Wall Color
properties.desc: The Border And Wall Color allows the user to set the color to use for border and walls.

properties.name: Convert To Packaged
properties.desc: Replace this module with a packaged version of the data.

properties.name: Sharpen Image
properties.desc: The Sharpen Image toggle will allow the user to sharpen the edges in an image by exaggerating the brightness difference along the edges.

properties.name: Soften Image
properties.desc: The Soften Image toggle will allow the user to soften the edges in an image by reducing the brightness difference along the edges.

properties.name: Enhance Edges
properties.desc: Enhances the Edges of the objects and discards other image information.

properties.name: Brightness
properties.desc: The Brightness slider can either add or remove brightness from every pixel.

properties.name: Contrast
properties.desc: The Contrast slider can either add or remove contrast from every pixel. Making bright spots brighter and dark spots darker

properties.name: White Balance Red
properties.desc: The White Balance Red slider affects the red channel of the white balance.

properties.name: White Balance Green
properties.desc: The White Balance Green slider affects the green channel of the white balance.

properties.name: White Balance Blue
properties.desc: The White Balance Blue slider affects the blue channel of the white balance.

properties.name: Gamma Correction Red
properties.desc: The Gamma Correction Red slider affects the gamma value for the red channel.

properties.name: Gamma Correction Green
properties.desc: The Gamma Correction Red slider affects the gamma value for the green channel.

properties.name: Gamma Correction Blue
properties.desc: The Gamma Correction Red slider affects the gamma value for the blue channel.

properties.name: Reproject Image
properties.desc: The Reproject Image toggle allows the user to enable Image Projections.

properties.name: Image Projection
properties.desc: The Image Projection allows the user to transform the image from one coordinate system to another.
